venue.address_1: At the end of Zealand Road
venue.name: Zealand Parking Lot
venue.address_3: drive to the end and park in the lots

item.description:
5 Summits - Zealand, Guyot, West Bond, Bond, Bondcliff
19.5 miles
3,700 foot elevation gain
book time is 11:35 - we are aiming for 9 hours

The forecast is looking great for Sunday, the foilage is peak, so we going to do a Zealand-Bonds Traverse.

We will aim to do better than book time including any stops along the way.

We will meet at the Zealand Road Parking area which is 3.6 miles up Zealand Road from Route 302 at 7:45 AM and be on the trail at 8 AM sharp!

Water can be topped off at the hut, but you will not have gone through much at that point. The next easy water source is about 1 mile after leaving the summit of Bondcliff, but will need to be filtered or otherwise made safe to drink. Water is available at the Guyot shelter, but adds distance and elevation to the hike. We recommend 3 liters per person. This is a hike to pack very light - 19.5 miles is a long way.

**Some may choose to trail run the last 5 miles on the Wilderness trail - all are encouraged to hike this last section at their own pace - we will wait in the parking lot until the last participant arrives. Car spotting will be pre-arranged.

Dogs that are capable of this distance and are well behaved are welcome.

All Maybe's will be changed to a NO Friday morning at 8 AM.
item.name: Zealand-Bonds Traverse - ADVANCED due to pace & distance - Dogs are welcome
